gameticket_package

Class Fan

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameticket_package.Fan

  • public class Fan
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds fan data. There are multiple fans in the system, Single-responsibility principle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fan(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a fan with the given name

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPurchasedTickets(Game game)
      Checks if the user already bought a ticket in a specific game or if he bought a ticket in other game in the same day of a specific game
      void checkUserBets()
      Checks the fan bets at the beginning of the system for any won or lost bets
      void displayFanDetails()
      Display fan details as name and his purchased tickets and bets if exists
      void displayPurchasedTickets()
      Displays the tickets of the fan
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the fan name
      void makeABet(Game game, int choice)
      Adds a new bet to the fan bets
      void removeTicket()
      Removes the ticket the fan chooses from his purchased tickets if it applies some conditions
      void reserveATicket(Game game, Seat seat)
      Adds a ticket to the fan purchased tickets
      void showBetsofaUser()
      Display the fan bets
      void upgradeTicket()
      Upgrades the ticket the fan chooses from his purchased tickets according to which category the seat of the ticket is

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • displayFanDetails

        public void displayFanDetails()
        Display fan details as name and his purchased tickets and bets if exists

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the fan name
        Returns:
        The fan name

      • displayPurchasedTickets

        public void displayPurchasedTickets()
        Displays the tickets of the fan

      • checkPurchasedTickets

        public boolean checkPurchasedTickets(Game game)
        Checks if the user already bought a ticket in a specific game or if he bought a ticket in other game in the same day of a specific game
        Parameters:
        game - the game user wants to get a ticket for
        Returns:
        true if user already have a ticket in sent game or if he has a ticket in another game in the same day of sent game

      • reserveATicket

        public void reserveATicket(Game game,
                           Seat seat)
        Adds a ticket to the fan purchased tickets
        Parameters:
        game - the game to which fans buys its ticket
        seat - the seat the user wants to reserve in that game

      • removeTicket

        public void removeTicket()
                  throws invalidChoiceException
        Removes the ticket the fan chooses from his purchased tickets if it applies some conditions
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException

      • upgradeTicket

        public void upgradeTicket()
                   throws invalidChoiceException
        Upgrades the ticket the fan chooses from his purchased tickets according to which category the seat of the ticket is
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException

      • makeABet

        public void makeABet(Game game,
                     int choice)
              throws invalidChoiceException
        Adds a new bet to the fan bets
        Parameters:
        game - the game the user makes a bet on
        choice - the number indicating which team the user chooses to win
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException - if the fan choice was neither 1 nor 2 which are the only teams he could choose from

      • showBetsofaUser

        public void showBetsofaUser()
        Display the fan bets

      • checkUserBets

        public void checkUserBets()
        Checks the fan bets at the beginning of the system for any won or lost bets
